verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not refrain <S%H662><s%> himself before all them that stood <S%H5324><s%> by him <S%H7121><s%>; and he cried, Cause <S%H3318><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to go out <S%H3318><s%> from me <S%H5975><s%>. And there stood no man <S%H376><s%> with him <S%H3130><s%>, while Joseph made himself known <S%H3045><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And he wept <S%H6963><s%> aloud <S%H5414><s%>: and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> heard <S%H1004><s%>, and the house of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, I am Joseph <S%H3130><s%>; doth my father <S%H1><s%> yet live <S%H2416><s%>? And his brethren <S%H251><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not answer <S%H6030><s%> him <S%H926><s%>; for they were troubled at his presence <S%H6440><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, Come near <S%H5066><s%> to me <S%H5066><s%>, I pray you. And they came near. And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am Joseph <S%H3130><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, whom ye sold <S%H4376><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And now be not grieved <S%H6087><s%>, nor angry <S%H2734><s%> with yourselves <S%H5869><s%>, that ye sold <S%H4376><s%> me hither <S%H430><s%>: for God did send <S%H7971><s%> me before you <S%H6440><s%> to preserve life <S%H4241><s%>.

For these two years <S%H8141><s%> hath the famine <S%H7458><s%> been in <S%H7130><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: and there are yet five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, in which there shall be neither <S%H369><s%> plowing <S%H2758><s%> nor harvest <S%H7105><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me before you <S%H6440><s%> to preserve <S%H7760><s%> you a remnant <S%H7611><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and to save you alive <S%H2421><s%> by a great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance <S%H6413><s%>.

So now it was not you that sent <S%H7971><s%> me hither <S%H430><s%>, but God: and he hath made <S%H7760><s%> me a father <S%H1><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and lord <S%H113><s%> of all his house <S%H1004><s%>, and ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Haste <S%H4116><s%> ye <S%H5927><s%>, and go up to my father <S%H1><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith thy son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath made <S%H7760><s%> me lord <S%H113><s%> of all Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: come down <S%H3381><s%> unto me <S%H5975><s%>, tarry not;

and thou shalt dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, and thou shalt be near <S%H7138><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, thou, and thy children, and thy children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>, and thy flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and thy herds <S%H1241><s%>, and all that thou hast:

and there will I nourish <S%H3557><s%> thee <S%H2568><s%>; for there are yet five years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>; lest thou come to poverty <S%H3423><s%>, thou <S%H1004><s%>, and thy household, and all that thou hast.

And <S%H5869><s%>, behold, your eyes see <S%H7200><s%>, and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of my brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, that it is my mouth <S%H6310><s%> that speaketh unto you <S%H1696><s%>.

And ye shall tell <S%H5046><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> of all my glory <S%H3519><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and of all that ye have seen <S%H7200><s%>: and ye shall haste <S%H4116><s%> and bring down <S%H3381><s%> my father hither <S%H1><s%>.
And he fell <S%H5307><s%> upon his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s neck <S%H6677><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>; and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> upon his neck <S%H6677><s%>.
And he kissed <S%H5401><s%> all his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> upon them <S%H310><s%>: and after that his brethren <S%H251><s%> talked with him <S%H1696><s%>.

And the report <S%H6963><s%> thereof was heard <S%H8085><s%> in Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%> are come <S%H935><s%>: and it pleased <S%H5869><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> well <S%H3190><s%>, and <S%H5869><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, This do <S%H6213><s%> ye <S%H2943><s%>: lade your beasts <S%H1165><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%>, get <S%H935><s%> you unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>;

and take <S%H3947><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your households <S%H1004><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H5414><s%>: and I will give you the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Now thou art commanded <S%H6680><s%>, this do <S%H6213><s%> ye <S%H3947><s%>: take you wagons <S%H5699><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and for your wives <S%H802><s%>, and bring <S%H5375><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%>.
Also <S%H5869><s%> regard <S%H2347><s%> not your stuff <S%H3627><s%>; for the good <S%H2898><s%> of all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt is yours <S%H4714><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3130><s%>: and Joseph gave <S%H5414><s%> them wagons <S%H5699><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way <S%H1870><s%>.

To all of them he gave <S%H5414><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of raiment <S%H8071><s%>; but to Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of raiment <S%H8071><s%>.

And to his father <S%H1><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> after this <S%H2063><s%> manner <S%H6235><s%>: ten asses <S%H860><s%> laden <S%H5375><s%> with the good things <S%H2898><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> she-asses <S%H2543><s%> laden <S%H5375><s%> with grain <S%H1250><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> and provision <S%H4202><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>.

So he sent <S%H7971><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> away <S%H7971><s%>, and they departed <S%H3212><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7264><s%>, See that ye fall not out by the way <S%H1870><s%>.
And they went up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>.

And they told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is yet alive <S%H2416><s%>, and he is ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. And his heart <S%H3820><s%> fainted <S%H6313><s%>, for he believed them not <S%H539><s%>.

And they told <S%H1696><s%> him all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, which he had said <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>: and when he saw the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> him <S%H7307><s%>, the spirit of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> revived <S%H2421><s%>:

and Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, It is enough <S%H7227><s%>; Joseph <S%H3130><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> is yet alive <S%H2416><s%>: I will go <S%H3212><s%> and see him <S%H7200><s%> before I die <S%H4191><s%>.
